column1: Kata Robata////I was most excited to try the fried Brussels sprouts since I love the one at Uchi
column2: comparison is key. But I was a bit let down when the taste was just okay
column3: maybe I prefer the one more due to the strong but subtle citrus. This one felt lackluster. Since we're talking about things that I wasn't a huge fan of
column4: let's continue. The yuzu salmon carpaccio and Kobe beef tacos were just okay as well - as far as the tacos go
column5: I guess this isn't exactly a place that would excel in that type of fusion.
